select p.*, sum(detail_cnt) as sales, e.p_ori_filename, e.p_sys_filename from (select a.p_idx, a.p_name, p_price, p_discount, p_disprice, p_wday, p_modifyday, p_size, p_status, b.p_category_idx, p_category_large, p_category_small, ifnull(avg(review_stars),0) as avg_reviews_stars, count(review_stars) as cnt_reviews from product a join p_category b on a.p_category_idx = b.p_category_idx left join review c on a.p_idx = c.p_idx where a.p_idx in (select p_idx from product where seller_idx=(select seller_idx from sellerstory where midx=#{member_id})) group by a.p_idx) as p left join detail d on p.p_idx = d.p_idx join (select p_idx , min(p_front_img), p_ori_filename, p_sys_filename , img_delyn from product_img where img_delyn='N' group by p_idx) e on p.p_idx=e.p_idx where p.p_idx in (select p_idx from product where seller_idx=(select seller_idx from sellerstory where midx=#{member_id})) and e.img_delyn='N'
and (p.p_idx like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or p_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
and p_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and p.p_idx like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and p.p_status=#{status}
and (p_category_large=1 or p_category_large=2)
and p_category_large=1
and p_category_large=2
and p_category_idx=#{category}
group by p.p_idx
order by p.p_wday desc
order by sales desc
order by p.p_disprice desc
order by p.p_disprice asc
order by p.cnt_reviews desc
order by p.avg_reviews_stars desc
select * from product where p_idx=#{p_idx}
select * from product_img where p_idx=#{p_idx} and img_delyn='N'
select count(*) from product where p_name = #{p_name}
select max(p_idx) as p_idx from product
select p_idx, p_name, p_dvprice from product where seller_idx = (select seller_idx from sellerstory where midx=#{member_id})

select b.detail_idx, e.midx, a.p_name, b.detail_cnt, e.m_name, e.m_id, e.midx, b.detail_status,b.detail_completeday, a.p_disprice, c.orders_day from product a join detail b on a.p_idx=b.p_idx join orders c on b.orders_idx=c.orders_idx join sellerstory d on a.seller_idx=d.seller_idx join members e on c.midx=e.midx where d.seller_idx = (select seller_idx from sellerstory where midx=#{member_id})
and (e.m_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or e.m_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
and e.m_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and e.m_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and detail_status=#{status}
and a.p_idx=#{product}
order by c.orders_day desc
update detail set detail_status=detail_status+1 where detail_idx=#{detail_idx}
mapper.insert: insert detail_day( detail_idx,detail_status) values( #{detail_idx}, (select max(detail_status) from detail where detail_idx=#{detail_idx}) )
mapper.select: update orders set orders_addr1=#{orders_addr1}, orders_addr2=#{orders_addr2}, orders_addr3=#{orders_addr3}, orders_name=#{orders_name},orders_phone=#{orders_phone} where orders_idx=#{orders_idx}
update detail set detail_request=#{detail_request} where detail_idx=#{detail_idx}
select * from detail_day where detail_idx=#{detail_idx} order by detail_status asc

select a.*, b.*, c.*, d.m_name, d.m_id, f.p_sys_filename, b.detail_completeday from product a join detail b on a.p_idx=b.p_idx join orders c on b.orders_idx=c.orders_idx join members d on c.midx=d.midx join detail_day e on b.detail_idx=e.detail_idx join product_img f on a.p_idx=f.p_idx where b.detail_idx=#{detail_idx} order by detail_status desc limit 0,1
update sellerstory set seller_img=#{seller_img} where midx=#{member_id}
update sellerstory set seller_intro=#{seller_intro} where midx=#{member_id}
mapper.update: update sellerstory set seller_bank=#{seller_bank}, seller_account_number=#{seller_account_number} where midx=#{midx}
update product_img set img_delyn='Y' where p_front_img=#{p_front_img}

choose.when: update product set p_delyn='Y' where p_idx=#{p_idx}
choose.otherwise: update product set p_delyn='N' where p_idx=#{p_idx}
